newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Hatton bids for Commercial stake -paper.
newsitem.headline: Hatton bids for Commercial stake -paper.

text.p: Hatton National Bank Ltd has made a bid for a stake in Commercial Bank Ltd, currently held by Standard Chartered Bank, the Island newspaper said on Thursday.
The newspaper said Standard Chartered chief executive C.A.T Leonard confirmed the deal, but refused to give further details.
The holding of 40 percent, which constitutes the largest single equity stake in Commercial Bank, has been on the market for over two years.
Rienzie T. Wijetilleke, managing director of Hatton National Bank, declined to comment on the report.
